content: You extract event details from inquiry emails.

Extract event details from this email and provide JSON in this format:
                                {
                                    "name": "contact name",
                                    "email": "contact email",
                                    "phone": "contact phone (optional)",
                                    "partyType": "type of event",
                                    "startTime": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm",
                                    "endTime": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm",
                                    "room": "requested venue space",
                                    "attendance": "expected guests",
                                    "services": ["array of requested services"],
                                    "notes": "additional details (optional)"
                                }

                                Email content:
                                Go through the following messages and fill in the JSON below. Try to look for the name, phone, and email. For email, exclude my email which is info@eattaco.ca. Dates should be in the format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm. Phone numbers should be in the format: 14162771856. IMPORTANT: respond only with the JSON, nothing else.

This is the JSON format that I want:

{
    "phone": "",
    "id": "",
    "status": "contractSent",
    "services": "bar;lights;audio;music;kareoke",
    "room": "Lounge",
    "name": "",
    "email": "",
    "startTime": "",
    "endTime": "",
    "rentalRate": "",
    "minSpend": "",
    "partyType": "",
    "attendance": "",
    "source": "",
    "notes": "",
    "summary": "" 
}

This is the email:

                        
                            From: "Yee, Kristen (MOF)" <Kristen.Yee2@ontario.ca>
                            To: info <info@eattaco.ca>
                            Subject: RE: New Event Inquiry
                            Time: 11/11/2024 20:37 (26 minutes ago)
                        
                        
                            Great, thank you! My number is 437-246-7839 and we are expecting between 30-40 people (likely around 35).Thanks,Kristen Yee (she/her)Counsel | Legal Services BranchMinistry of Finance | Ontario Public Service437-246-7839 | kristen.yee2@ontario.ca777 Bay Street, 11th FloorToronto ON M5G 2E3[cid:image001.png@01DB3479.94178C60]Taking pride in strengthening Ontario, its places and its peopleFrom: Taco Taco Sent: Friday, November 8, 2024 4:53 PMTo: Yee, Kristen (MOF) Subject: Re: New Event InquiryCAUTION -- EXTERNAL E-MAIL - Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender.No worries! Can I just get your phone number? Just need it to add to the contract, and roughly how many guests would you be expecting?TacoTaco Events Team(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.caeattaco.ca[https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/mail-sig/AIorK4wjvL-MtVuSN6X8zc1j6wpPf1GadtxF2McVDmk2PYfNnoXh3xNrxzL0PfmYSCHj-VCnCeXOXNIy-2vK]On Fri, Nov 8, 2024 at 4:52 PM Yee, Kristen (MOF) > wrote:Great, thank you so much. I would love to book the dining space for that time.Please let me know if you need any further information.Thanks,Kristen Yee (she/her)Counsel | Legal Services BranchMinistry of Finance | Ontario Public Service437-246-7839 | kristen.yee2@ontario.ca777 Bay Street, 11th FloorToronto ON M5G 2E3[cid:image001.png@01DB3479.94178C60]Taking pride in strengthening Ontario, its places and its peopleFrom: Taco Taco >Sent: Friday, November 8, 2024 4:50 PMTo: Yee, Kristen (MOF) >Subject: Re: New Event InquiryCAUTION -- EXTERNAL E-MAIL - Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender.Hi Kristen,Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The front dining space is available that day. The cost is $100/hr with a minimum spend of $300 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up. Let me know if you have any questions!TacoTaco Events Team(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.caeattaco.ca[https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/mail-sig/AIorK4wjvL-MtVuSN6X8zc1j6wpPf1GadtxF2McVDmk2PYfNnoXh3xNrxzL0PfmYSCHj-VCnCeXOXNIy-2vK]On Fri, Nov 8, 2024 at 2:04 PM > wrote:Name: Kristen YeePhone:Email: kristen.yee2@ontario.caDescription: 12:30-3:30 pm office holiday partyDate: 2024-12-10Guests:
                        
                     Email: Kristen.Yee2@ontario.ca
